import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Header from '../components/Header.js'; import styles from '../styles.js'; function ProblemEditor({ user, currentProblem, isNew }) { const [problem, setProblem] = useState(currentProblem); const [error, setError] = useState(null); async function postProblem() { console.log(JSON.stringify(problem)); try { const response = await fetch("http://34.124.232.186:5000/admin/problem/", { method: "POST", headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': "Token " + user.token }, body: JSON.stringify(problem) }); let json = await response.json(); console.log(json); } catch (e) { setError(e); } } return (

{isNew ? "Create new problem" : "Edit problem"}

setProblem({...problem, display_id: e.target.value})}/>
setProblem({...problem, is_visible: e.target.value})}/>
setProblem({...problem, title: e.target.value})}/>
setProblem({...problem, test_zip: e.target.value})}/>
setProblem({...problem, time_limit: e.target.value})}/>
setProblem({...problem, memory_limit: e.target.value})}/>
setProblem({...problem, total_submission: e.target.value})}/>
setProblem({...problem, correct_submission: e.target.value})}/>

{error != null ? error : null}

); } export default ProblemEditor;
